msg: NUTCH-574 - Including inlink anchor text in index can create irrelevant search results.  Moved inbound anchor text indexing from index-basic to new index-anchor plugin.  For backwards compatibility index-anchor will need to be added to the nutch-site.xml plugin.includes configuration variable.
